titleStmt.title: Lectures de potentia restitutiva, or, Of spring explaining the power of springing bodies : to which are added some collections viz. a description of Dr. Pappins wind-fountain and force-pump, Mr. Young's observation concerning natural fountains, some other considerations concerning that subject, Captain Sturmy's remarks of a subterraneous cave and cistern, Mr. G.T. observations made on the Pike of Teneriff, 1674, some reflections and conjectures occasioned thereupon, a relation of a late eruption in the Isle of Palma / by Robert Hooke ...
titleStmt.author: Hooke, Robert, 1635-1703.
Papin, Denis, 1647-1714.
Young, James.
Sturmy, Samuel, 1633-1669.
G. T.

biblFull.extent: [1], 56 p., [1] folded leaf of plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
